name: Pizza Quest
description:
Pizza! Pizza! Pizza! It's the baked-cheese-snack-based game of you're dreams; PIZZA QUEST!

Set in a post-apocalyptic, fantasy, sci-fi world, follow the trials and tribulations of a one-eyed hero, and his quest for salvation (or pizza). When disaster strikes will you stop at nothing for a hot slice? Or wait for help patiently, as your companion instructed? The choice is yours! Maybe wondering The Wastes aimlessly till you explode is more your thing? You can do that too!

Pizza Quest is a game about doubt, made for you, with love, by Team Lazerbeam. Bon Appetit!
